description: The horizontal alignment of an anchored object. Not valid when anchored position is inline.

properties.description: Place the anchored object to the right of the reference.
properties.name: RIGHT_ALIGN

properties.description: Place the anchored object to the left of the reference.
properties.name: LEFT_ALIGN

properties.description: Place the anchored object at the center of the reference.
properties.name: CENTER_ALIGN

properties.description: Place the anchored object relative to the text alignment.
properties.name: TEXT_ALIGN

name: HorizontalAlignment
